"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This classic rock anthem would be the perfect opening track for a soundtrack that captures the drive and determination needed to overcome obstacles and reach goals.

"Roar" by Katy Perry - A powerful and empowering song that embodies the spirit of resilience and self-empowerment, reminding the listener that they have the strength within themselves to overcome any challenge.
"Unstoppable" by Sia - A catchy and upbeat song that celebrates the idea of being unstoppable and unbreakable, providing a sense of momentum and motivation to keep pushing forward.
"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - A high-energy hip-hop track that captures the intensity and focus needed to tackle difficult tasks and achieve greatness.
"Brave" by Sara Bareilles - A heartfelt and emotional ballad that encourages the listener to be brave and vulnerable, reminding them that it's okay to be themselves and to embrace their true selves.
